message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. I'm willing to go up to $10,200. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

I understand your position, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $10,200. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,800. This is the lowest I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $10,800. I'm willing to meet you at $10,400. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

I'm not willing to meet you at $10,400, Bob. I think I've already made a significant concession. I'm willing to make one more offer, but it's my final one. I'll sell it to you for $10,600. This is the absolute lowest I'm willing to go. What do you think?

I understand that you're making a final offer, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $10,600. I'm willing to meet you at $10,300. I think that's the highest I'm willing to go, and I'm starting to consider buying from John at $8,000 if we can't come to an agreement.

I understand your position, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $10,300. I've already made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to give up any more value. I'll make one more offer, and it's my final one. I'll sell it to you for $10,500. This is the absolute highest I'm willing to go. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to pay $10,500. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000. If I don't get a better deal, I'm afraid I'll have to consider buying from John at $8,000.
